zu.interpretation: Ukuba ngokomthetho-sisekelo kwesigwebo sokufa kwaba ngesinye sezahlulelo zeNkantolo Yomthetho-sisekelo zokuqala eziyingqayizivele futhi nakuba isahlulelo seningi singagxilanga elungelweni lokuphila, ezinye izahlulelo ezihambisanayo zagcizelela ukuthi ilungelo lokuphila lihlangene ngokungehlukaniswe nelungelo lokunikwa isithunzi. Iningi lamajaji laqaphela ukuthi isigwebo sokufa asilinciphisi ilungelo lokuphila kodwa empeleni silisusa ngokuphelele. Okubalulekile, ilungelo lokuphila lachazwa njengelungelo lokujabulela ubuntu futhi liwukuboniswa komuntu ngamunye ukuthi uwutho futhi ubalulekile emphakathini.
zu.mechanism: Okuchazwa wukungathandabuzwa kwelungelo lokuphila kodwa libe lisenokubekelwa umngcele wukuthi umthetho ovumela ilungelo lokubulala ngesizathu sokuzivikela uwumngcele ofanelekayo elungelweni lokuphila njengoba kunjalo ngokusebenzisa kwamaphoyisa indluzula ezimweni ezimbalwa kakhulu.

zu.title: Inkululeko nokuphepha komuntu
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sinika wonke umuntu ilungelo lenkululeko nokulondeka komuntu kanye nelungelo lokuqinisekiswa ngokomzimba nangokomcabango (bodily and psychological integrity).
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 12 soMthetho-sisekelo asiniki nje kuphela wonke umuntu ilungelo lenkululeko nokulondeka komuntu, kodwa futhi sinika wonke umuntu ilungelo lokuqinisekiswa ngokomzimba nangokomcabango. Kubalulekile ukuqonda ukuthi ilungelo lenkululeko nokulondeka komuntu elihlanganisa izici ezihlukahlukene njengelungelo lokungephucwa inkululeko isinomakanjani nelungelo lokungahlukunyenzwa (emzimbeni), liqinisekisa kokubili ukuvikeleka ngokwamaqiniso endaba nangenqubo elandelwa ekusingatheni udaba (substantive and procedural protection).
zu.interpretation:
Isici esingokwamaqiniso endaba selungelo lenkululeko nokulondeka komuntu sibizela ukuba ukwephucwa komuntu inkululeko kube wukufezekisa injongo kahulumeni efanelekile esuselwa emthethweni kanti ubulungisa obungokwenqubo elandelwayo baleli lungelo kanye nezinyathelo okumele zithathwe buzoya ngokwezimo zodaba ngalunye.

 

Ilungelo lokuqinisekiswa ngokomzimba nangokomcabango liqhubekela elungelweni lokwenza izinqumo eziphathelene nokuzala, ukulondeka nokukwazi ukulawula mayelana nomzimba wakho kanye nelungelo lokungafakwa kuma-eksperimenti ezokwelapha noma ezesayensi ngaphandle kokunika imvume esekelwe olwazini.
zu.legislation: The Choice on Termination of Pregnancy Act 92 of 1996 was specifically enacted to give expression to the right to make reproductive choices.

zu.title: Ubugqila, ukusentshenziswa njengesigqila  nokusetshenziswa ngenkani
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sihlinzekela ukuba kungabikho muntu owenziwa isisulu sobugqila, ubucashalala (servitude) noma ukusetshenziswa ngokuphoqelelwa.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 13 soMthetho-sisekelo sihlinzeka ukuthi akukho muntu okuvumeleke ukuba enziwe isisulu sobugqila, i-servitude noma ukusetshenziswa ngokuphoqelelwa. Ngokomqondo wosuku lwanamuhla ubugqila bunokuqondwa njengokubeka umuntu othile ngaphansi kokulawula komunye umuntu, okwenza loyo muntu abe wumnikazi walo omunye. Le ncazo esabalele ihlanganisa eziningi izinhlobo zobudlelwano bokuqhoqelelwa, okungaba sendaweni yomsebenzi, ekhaya noma kwenye indawo.
zu.legislation: South Africa is a signatory to various international law conventions obligating States to eradicate slavery and servitude such as the 1956 Supplementary Convention on the Abolition of Slavery, the Slave Trade and Institutions and Practices Similar to Slavery. In 2013, the Prevention and Combatting of Trafficking in Persons Act 7 of 2013 was specifically enacted to give effect to South Africa’s international and constitutional obligations and this Act provides measures specifically to protect and assist victims of trafficking.

zu.title: Ukungaphazanyiswa
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sinika wonke umuntu ilungelo jikelele lokuba nengasese nokuvikelwa ezimeni ezithile ngokukhethekile zokungalihloniphi ingasese lomuntu.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 14 soMthetho-sisekelo asigcini ngokuqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo jikelele lokuba nengasese kodwa futhi sihlinzeka ukuvikelwa ezimeni ezithile ngokukhethekile zokungalihloniphi ingasese lomuntu njengelungelo lokuba lingaseshwa ikhaya lomuntu, ingathathwa impahla yakhe kanye nelungelo lokuba ukukhuluma kwakhe kube nengasese. Ukuvikelwa kwaleli lungelo kuqaphela ukuthi wonke umuntu unelungelo lokuzimela yedwana abe nezinto zakhe ezenziwa esithe.
zu.interpretation: Ukuvikelwa ngokomthetho-sisekelo okunikwayo kuye kwahunyushwa yiNkantolo Yomthetho-sisekelo njengokwenabela kulezo zici zokuphila komuntu okulindeleke kuzo ngokufanelekile ukuba nengasese. Ekucabangeleni ukuthi liye lanyathelwa yini ilungelo lengasese lomuntu, izinkantolo angeke zigcine ngokucabangela kuphela loko isisulu esilindele ukuba kube yinto yangasese (ukulindela okunaka izidingo zahlangothi lunye) kodwa futhi nengxenye ecabangela nezidingo zabanye kuloko kulindelwa kwengasese, kucatshangelwa ukuthi ingabe umphakathi uyokubheka loko kulindela njengokunokucabangela okuhle yini. Ingxenye ecabangela zonke izinhlangothi igxile kuloko okutholwe yinkantolo mayelana nokuthi kuyafaneleka yini ngokucabangela okuhle ukuba loyo muntu othi alihlonishwanga ingasese lakhe alindele ukuvikelwa kwengasese lakhe ngokwezimo zaleyo ndaba.
zu.mechanism: Ukuvikelwa kwelungelo lokuba nengasese komuntu kuqina kakhudlwana uma kuthinta eduze izinto zokuphila komuntu zayedwana, njengekhaya, bese kuthi ukuxega uma kuya ngokuqhela kulowo mnyombo. Ngokwesibonelo, leli lungelo lizokuvikela ngokuqinile kakhulu ukuphila komuntu kwasekhaya, ukuzikhethela komuntu ngokwezocansi nendawo ezungezile yasekhaya. Ilungelo lokuba nengasese lihlobene eduze nelungelo lokunikwa isithunzi.
zu.legislation: The Protection of Personal Information Act 4 of 2013 was specifically enacted to give effect to the right to informational privacy and the Act provides strict measures for the processing of personal information by public and private bodies. The Information Regulator established in terms of the Act is an independent body empowered to monitor compliance of the Act.

zu.title: Inkululeko kwezenkolo, yenkolelo neyombono
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lenkululeko kanembeza, inkolo, umcabango, inkolelo nombono (opinion).
zu.topic_meaning:
Isigaba 15 (1) soMthetho-sisekelo siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo likanembeza, inkolo, umcabango, inkolelo, nombono. Ilungelo lenkululeko yenkolo lenabela futhi naselungelweni lokungazilandeli lezo zinkolelo. Abaklami boMthetho-sisekelo bákuqapha ukuba baziphathe ngendlela efanayo zonke izinkolo ukuqinisekisa ukuvikeleka ngokomthetho-sisekelo kwelungelo lenkululeko yokucabanga nenkolelo, okuhlanganisa nokungakholelwa kunoma muphi unkulunkulu nokucabanga okukhululekile

 

Isigaba 15(2) soMthetho-sisekelo sibalula ukuthi leyo migubho yenkolo inokubanjelwa ezinkhungweni ezixhaswa wuMbuso ngaphansi kwezimo ezithile njengesidingo sokuqinisekisa ukuthi ukwethanyelwa kwenzeka ngokwemithetho ebekwe yigunya elithile likahulumeni, iqhutshwa ngendlela ecabangela kahle bonke futhi yethanyelwa ngokukhululekile nangokuzithandela.
zu.interpretation: Lesi sigaba sibalulekile njengoba sigcizelela ukuthi izinkolelo nemibono okungafani kukufanelekele ukuvikelwa futhi kufanele kunikwe indawo futhi siyakuvuma ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika iwumphakathi wamasiko-mpilo amaningi. Ilungelo lenkululeko yenkolo livikelekile uma kungekho kucindezelwa noma ukuvinjelwa kwenkolelo noma umkhuba ongokwenkolo futhi leli lungelo liyobe linyathelwe uma kuye kwaba nezinyathelo eziphoqa abantu ukuba benze ngendlela engqubuzana nezinkolelo zabo.
zu.mechanism: Isigaba 15 soMthetho-sisekelo sinika ilungelo lokukholelwa kuNkulunkulu othile noma oNkulunkulu kanye nezimfundiso ezingokwenkolo ezihambisana nenkolelo kuloyo Nkulunkulu noma oNkulunkulu; ilungelo lokuhlala ungenasiqiniseko ngokukholelwa kuNkulunkulu noma oNkulunkulu kanye nezimfundiso ezihambisana nenkolelo kuloyo Nkulunkulu noma oNkulunkulu; kanye nelungelo lokungakholelwa nhlobo kunoma muphi uNkulunkulu. Nokho, akulona kuphela ilungelo lokukholelwa noma ukungakhlolelwa elivikelwa yisigaba 15 soMthetho-sisekelo. Isigaba 15 sivikela futhi nelungelo lokwenza ngokuvumelana nalezo zinkolelo noma ukungabikho kwezinkolelo nanokuthi umuntu ahlele ukuphila kwakhe ngendlela ebonisa ukunamathela kulolo hlelo lokukholelwa alukhethile.
zu.legislation: Section 15(3) of the Constitution empowers the State to enact legislation to recognise customary and religious marriages and the Recognition of Customary Marriages Act 120 of 1998 affords legal recognition to customary marriages prescribing to certain requirements and provides equal status to spouses in customary marriages.

zu.title: Ukuveza imibono ngokukhululeka
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lenkululeko yokuveza imibono yakhe elihlanganisa inkululeko yokushicilela izindaba, ilungelo lokuthola nokunika ulwazi (information), inkululeko yokuqamba kobuciko kanye nenkululeko yezemfundo ephakeme neyezesayensi.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 16(1) soMthetho-sisekelo siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lenkululeko yokuveza imibono yakhe elingagcini kuphela ngokuhlanganisa inkululeko yokushicilela izindaba neminye imithombo yezindaba, kodwa futhi elihlanganisa nenkululeko yokuthola nokunika ulwazi, inkululeko yokuqamba kobuciko kanye nenkululeko yezemfundo ephakeme neyezesayensi. Isigaba 16(2) soMthetho-sisekelo sichaza ngokukhethekile ukuthi yiziphi izinhlobo zokukhuluma ezingavikelwe wumthetho-sisekelo nokuthi ilungelo lenkululeko yokuveza okusenhliziyweni alizihlanganisi lezi zinhlobo zokukhuluma. Lezi zinhlobo ezingengaki zihlanganisa inkulumo-ze (propaganda) yokuphehla impi, ukuphehla udlame olusheshayo noma ukubhebhethekisa inzondo ngokobuhlanga, ubuzwe (ethnicity), ubulili noma inkolo futhi ehlanganisa ukugqugquzelwa kokulimaza. Ngenkulumo ejwayelekile, lolu hlobo lokugcina lwaziwa njengokuvinjelwa kwenkulumo yenzondo. Lezi zigaba zikhona ngoba zinako ukuthi zingasithinta kabi isithunzi sabanye futhi zibalimaze.
zu.mechanism: Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi uma ukuvezwa kwemibono okuthile kuwela phakathi kwesinye salezi zigaba ezimbalwa ngokwesigaba 16(2) soMthetho-sisekelo, leyo mibono ayivikelwe wuMthetho-sisekelo futhi akukho ukubuza ngayo ukuthi kukhona yini ukunyathelwa kwelungelo lenkululeko yokuveza imibono ngenxa yokuthi lezi zinhlobo zokuveza umbono zenqatshelwe wuMthetho-sisekelo futhi ziwela ngaphandle kwemingcele yokuveza imibono okuvikelwe ngokomthetho-sisekelo. Nokho, uma ukuveza imibono kungekho phakathi kwesinye salezi zigaba ezimbalwa ezenqatshelwe kusho ukuthi kuvikelwe wuMthetho-sisekelo futhi noma miphi imithetho ezama ukulawula noma ukuthiya leyo nkulumo kufanele iphase isivivinyo sokuthiywa kwamalungelo ngokwesigaba 36 soMthetho-sisekelo.
zu.legislation: The Promotion of Equality and Prevention of Unfair Discrimination Act 4 of 2000, is the constitutionally mandated legislation envisaged in section 9(4) of the Constitution and amongst other things, regulates hate speech.

zu.title: Ukubuthana, ukubhikisha, ukuphikhetha nokwethula izicelo
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sivikela ilungelo lokubuthana, ukubhikisha (to demonstrate), ukupikita (to picket) nokwethula izikhalo ngombandela wokuthi konke kwenziwa ngokuthula futhi kungahlonyiwe.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 17 soMthetho-sisekelo sivikela ilungelo lokubuthana, ukubhikisha, ukupikita nokwethula izikhalo ngombandela wokuthi konke kwenziwa ngokuthula futhi kungahlonyiwe. Imibhikisho (protests) kanye nemibuthano kwaba yithuluzi elinamandla ekulwiseni umbuso wobandlululo futhi ukuvikelwa ngokomthetho-sisekelo kwaleli lungelo kumele kubhekwe ngokwalowo mongo wendaba. Futhi leli lungelo liyindlela ebalulekile yokungenela endabeni emphakathini osebenza ngentando yeningi, enika ithuluzi elingokwepolitiki kumaqembu abantu abanganakiwe abebengeke babe nenye indlela yokuzwakalisa izikhalo zabo.
zu.interpretation: Imibuthano, imibhikisho, ukupikita, kanye nokufaka izikhalo kuvumela amaqembu, lawo ngenye indlela abengenakuba namthelela otheni kumaqembu epolitiki noma enqubeni yezepolitiki, ukuba azwakalise izingqinamba ezibalulekile kuwo, ukuba enze zinakwe lezo zingqinamba futhi akhulumisane nezinye izakhamuzi ezingozakwabo kanye nabameleli bawo ngalezo zingqinamba.
zu.legislation: The Regulations of Gatherings Act 205 of 1993 provides detail on the lawful conduct of gatherings. This piece of legislation pre-dates the Constitution and faced a constitutional challenge in 2018. The Constitutional Court declared section 12(1)(a) of the Act, which criminalised the failure to notify the relevant authority of a gathering, unconstitutional and invalid.

zu.title: Ilungelo lokuzimbandakanya
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lenkululeko yokujoyina inhlangano [ayikhethayo].
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 18 soMthetho-sisekelo siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lenkululeko yokujoyina inhlangano [ayikhethayo]. Leli lungelo liye lachazwa njengelungelo elihlobene namanye njengoba liqinisa amanye amalungelo asoHleni Lwamalungelo (Bill of Rights). Ngokwesibonelo, leli lungelo liqinisa ilungelo lomuntu lokwakha iqembu lepolitiki futhi liqinisa ilungelo lesisebenzi lokwakha noma ukujoyina inyunyana yezisebenzi. Leli lungelo livikela ukuzikhethela kwabantu ngabanye bese linciphisa ukugxambukela kukahulumeni. Leli lungelo linika abantu ngabanye ukuzimela futhi lenze abantu bakwazi ukuzikhethela ukuthi bafuna ukukuhlela kanjani ukuphila kwabo futhi baziwe ukuthi bangobani njengabantu abanobudlelwane nabanye emphakathini othile, kuthi ngaleyo ndlela kukhuliswe ukuhlonishwa nokuvikelwa kokwehlukahluka kwabantu.
zu.interpretation: Kubalulekile ukugcizelela ukuthi ilungelo lenkululeko yokujoyina inhlangano yokuzikhethela lenabela naselungelweni lokuba umuntu angaphoqelelwa ukujoyina. Lesi sici esiphikisayo ngelungelo lenkululeko yokujoyina inhlangano yokuzikhethela safeza enkulu indima ekutholeni kweNkantolo Yomthetho-sisekelo odabeni lwe-New Nation Movement and Others v President of South Africa and Others [2020] ZACC 11 ukuthi uMthetho Wezokhetho 73 ka-1998 (Electoral Act 73 of 1998) awuhambisani nomthetho-sisekelo ngezinga lokuthi wawenqabela isakhamuzi esizimele ukuba sincintisane okhethweni lukazwelonke nolwesifundazwe.
zu.mechanism: Nakuba leli lungelo linesici sokubandakanya iningi, ngokuyinhloko liyilungelo lomuntu ngamunye kunokuba kube ngelenhlangano eye yamiswa, ukuze kwenziwe kwenzeke kangcono ukuvikelwa kwamalungelo omuntu ngamunye.

zu.title: Amalungelo ezombusazwe
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sibalula ngokusabalele amalungelo ezepolitiki njengelungelo lokwakha iqembu lepolitiki, ilungelo lokukhankasela iqembu lepolitiki kanye nokubamba iqhaza ezinkethweni ezinobulungisa futhi ezivamile ukwenzeka nokuthi, uma eye wakhethwa, angenele isikhundla somphakathi.
zu.topic_meaning:
Isigaba 19 soMthetho-sisekelo sibalula ngokusabalele amalungelo ezepolitiki njengelungelo lokwakha iqembu lepolitiki, ilungelo lokukhankasela iqembu lepolitiki noma iphuzu kanye nokubamba iqhaza ezinkethweni ezinobulungisa futhi ezivamile ukwenzeka nokuthi, uma eye wakhethwa, angenele isikhundla somphakathi.

 

Isigaba 19 soMthetho-sisekelo, lapho sifundwa nesigaba 1(d) soMthetho-sisekelo, siqokomisa isimiso (principle) sokuthi isici esiwumongo sokubusa kwentando yeningi okunabameleli siwukuba kube khona amaqembu angaphezu kwelilodwa kunokuba kube wumbuso waqembu linye othiya ngendlela yepolitiki ukubanjwa kweqhaza kwezepolitiki.
zu.interpretation: Uhlu olusabalele lwamalungelo ezepolitiki oluqinisekiswa kuMthetho-sisekelo kumele lubhekwe ngokomongo walo ongokomlando lapho iningi labantu baseNingizimu Afrika lalinqatshelwe ilungelo lokubamba iqhaza kwezepolitiki.
zu.legislation: The Electoral Act 73 of 1998 regulates elections of the National Assembly, the Provincial Legislature and Municipal councils. In 2020, the Constitutional Court found that the Electoral Act was unconstitutional to the extent that independent candidates were not able to be elected for the National Assembly and Provincial Legislature, and Parliament was required to remedy this defect.

zu.title: Ubuzwe
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sibalula ukuthi akukho sakhamuzi esinokwenqatshelwa ukuba yisakhamuzi.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 20 soMthetho-sisekelo sibalula ukuthi ‘akukho sakhamuzi esinokwenqatshelwa ukuba yisakhamuzi’. Leli lungelo lingachazwa njengelungelo elivikela abantu ukuba bangabi ngabangenazwe lakubo futhi ligcizelela ukuthi wonke umuntu kufanele abe yisakhamuzi sezwe elithile. Lihambisana nezibopho zeNingizimu Afrika ezingokomthetho wamazwe zokuba isakhamuzi singephucwa ukuba yisakhamuzi isinomakanjani nokuletha isivikelo ekubeni wumuntu ongenalo izwe lakubo, okuyinto engaba nemiphumela emibi kakhulu.
zu.interpretation: INkantolo Yomthetho-sisekelo ibambelele ekuthini ukuba yisakhamuzi kubophene eduze nelungelo lokunikwa isithunzi futhi kungaphezulu kakhulu kunokuba nje yisimo esingokomthetho njengoba liyisisekelo ekuhlonzeni ukuthi umuntu uwubani.
zu.mechanism: UMthetho Wokuba Yisakhamuzi SaseNingizimu Afrika 88 ka-1995 (South African Citizenship Act 88 of 1995) unika indlela yokuthi kutholwa kanjani ukuba yisakhamuzi saseNingizimu kanti isahluko 3 salo Mthetho sidingida ngokukhethekile ukulahlekelwa wukuba yisakhamuzi.

zu.title: Ilungelo lokuhamba nokuhlala
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lenkululeko yokuhamba [esuka kwenye indawo eya kwenye] (movement) nendawo yokuhlala futhi libalula ukuthi leso naleso sakhamuzi sinelungelo lokungena, ukuqhubeka sisendaweni ethile nokuhlala nomaphi eRiphabliki.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 21 soMthetho-sisekelo siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lenkululeko yokuhamba [esuka kwenye indawo eya kwenye] nendawo yokuhlala futhi sibalula ukuthi leso naleso sakhamuzi asigcini ngokuba nelungelo lokungena, ukuqhubeka sisendaweni ethile nokuhlala nomaphi eRiphabliki nje kuphela kodwa futhi wonke umuntu unelungelo lokunyakaza ngokukhululekile nokuphuma eRiphabliki. Ngaphezu kwaloko, ngokwalesi sigaba leso naleso sakhamuzi sinanelungelo lokuthola ipasipoti.
zu.interpretation: Leli lungelo kumele libhekwe ngokunaka umlando wokuthi imithetho yombuso wobandlululo yabeka imingcele emikhulu ekunyakazeni ngokukhululekile kwabantu abaMnyama ezweni nanokuthi ukuqashelwa ngokomthetho-sisekelo kwelungelo labantu lokunyakaza ngokukhululekile nokuthi izakhamuzi zithole ipasipoti kuwukugqashuka ngokuphelele emthethweni wobushiqela wombuso wobandlululo. Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ilungelo lokunyakaza ngokukhululekile nokuhamba ushiye iRiphabliki linikwa wonke umuntu kanti ilungelo lokungena, ukuqhubeka usendaweni ethile nokuhlala kanye nelungelo lokuthola ipasipoti linikwa izakhamuzi kuphela.

zu.title: Ilungelo lomsebenzi wezandla, lomsebenzi owenziwayo nomsebenzi ofundelwe
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba siqinisekisa leso naleso sakhamuzi saseNingizimu Afrika ngelungelo lokuzikhethela ngokukhululekile umsebenzi waso wezandla (trade), umsebenzi wokuqashwa (occupation) noma iprofesheni.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 22 soMthetho-sisekelo siqinisekisa izakhamuzi zaseNingizimu Afrika ngelungelo lokuzikhethela ngokukhululekile umsebenzi waso wezandla, umsebenzi wokuqashwa noma iprofesheni. Isigaba sibuye sibalule nokuthi ukwenza umsebenzi wezandla, umsebenzi wokuqashwa noma iprofesheni kungase kulawulwe wumthetho.
zu.interpretation: Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi leli lungelo elingokomthetho-sisekelo lingelezakhamuzi kuphela. Libekwe njengelungelo lokungenzi okuthile (negative right), ngokunciphisa ukugxambukela kukahulumeni ekuzikhetheleni komuntu umsebenzi wezandla, umsebenzi wokuqashwa noma iprofesheni. Futhi ilungelo lokunikwa isithunzi liphithene eduze nenkululeko yokuzikhethela umsebenzi wezandla, umsebenzi wokuqashwa neprofesheni. Ukuqashelwa kwaleli lungelo ngokomthetho-sisekelo kumele futhi kubhekwe ngokomongo womlando lapho khona imithetho kaHulumeni wobandlululo yaphumela ekubekweni kwabathile ngaphandle kwezomnotho.
zu.mechanism: Nakuba uHulumeni enqatshelwe ukugxambukela ekuzikhetheleni kwesakhamuzi umsebenzi wezandla, umsebenzi wokuqashwa noma iprofesheni, uHulumeni uvumelekile ukulawula umsebenzi wezandla, umsebenzi wokuqashwa noma iprofesheni – njengoba kunjalo ngeprofeshini lezokwelapha kodwa kumele ukulawula kwenziwe ngokulandela umthetho oshayiwe.

zu.title: Ubudlelwane phakathi kwabasebenzi nabaqashi
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sikhuluma ngamalungelo abantu abanawo emsebenzini.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 23(1) soMthetho-sisekelo siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lezinkambiso zasemsebenzini ezinobulungisa. Isigaba 23(2) soMthetho-sisekelo sibalula ngokukhethekile amalungelo ahlukahlukene isisebenzi esinawo, njengokwakha noma ukujoyina inyunyana yezisebenzi nokuteleka. Isigaba 23(3) siqinisekisa abaqashi ngamalungelo athile njengokwakha noma ukujoyina inhlangano yabaqashi. Amalungelo ezinyunyana zezisebenzi nezinhlangano zabaqashi abalulwe esigabeni 23(4) kanti isigaba 23(5) sihinzeka ukuthi izinyunyana zezisebenzi, izinhlangano zabaqashi nabaqashi banelungelo lokuxoxisana ndawonye ngezimfuno zasemsebenzini nanokuthi ungase kushaywe imithetho yezwe ukulawula ukuxoxisana ndawonye ngezimfuno zasemsebenzini.
zu.interpretation: Nakuba amatemu asesigabeni 23, njengokuthi abaqashi noma izinyunyana zezisebenzi, echazeka kalula, kuye kwadingeka kaningana ukuba izinkantolo zisho ukuthi itemu elithi isisebenzi lichazeka kanjani.
zu.legislation: The Labour Relations Act 66 of 1995 was specifically enacted to give effect and regulate this constitutional right. It is the national legislation referred to in sections 23(5) and (6) of the Constitution. The Act provides a framework for collective bargaining, the resolution of labour disputes and the regulation of organisational rights of trade unions. It is important to note that the Labour Relations Act does not apply to members of the National Defence Force or to members of the State Security Agency.

zu.title: Indawo okuphilwa kuyo
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba siqinisekisa ngelungelo lokuba nendawo ezungezile engeyona ingozi empilweni (health) noma ukuphathekeni kahle (wellbeing) kwabantu.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 24 soMthetho-sisekelo siqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu unelungelo lokuba nendawo ezungezile engeyona ingozi empilweni yakhe noma ekuphathekeni kahle futhi sibeka isibopho sokwenza phezu koMbuso ukuba uvikele indawo ezungezile ukuze kuzuze izizukulwane zesikhathi esizayo nezamanje. UMbuso unesibopho sokushaya imithetho nokuthatha ezinye izinyathelo ezisesilinganisweni esikahle ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uyasifeza lesi sibopho futhi uma uMbuso uhluleka ukwenza kanjalo, umuntu anokuthembela esigabeni 24 soMthetho-sisekelo. Lesi sibopho esingokomthetho-sisekelo sisebenza hhayi eMbusweni kuphela kodwa futhi nakuloko okwenziwa yizinkampani kanye nabantu ngabanye. Isenezelo esibalulekile kuMthetho-sisekelo Wokugcina kwaba wukuqinisekisa ukuthi uMbuso wenza intuthuko ezinzile ohlelweni lokusebenza kwezinto zemvelo kanye nokusetshenziswa kwezinsiza ezingokwemvelo, njengoba kudingwa yisigaba 24(b)(iii) soMthetho-sisekelo.
zu.legislation: The National Environment Management Act 107 of 1998, gives effect to section 24 of the Constitution and provides an integrated environmental management framework.

zu.title: Amalungelo empahla
zu.snippet: Ilungiselelo lempahla elisoHleni Lwamalungelo lihloselwe kokubili ukuvikela nokulungisa.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 25(1) ukuya ku-(3) soMthetho-sisekelo sivikela umuntu ekwenqatshelwemi isinomakanjani ukuba abe nempahla-mhlaba (property) futhi sibalule nezimfuneko zokwephucwa yona. Loku kusho ukuthi uHulumeni akanakugxambukela empahleni-mhlaba yomuntu ngaphandle kokulandela umthetho osetshenziswa jikelele ngenjongo yomphakathi noma ukuze kuzuze umphakathi futhi kube khona isinxephezelo. Isigaba 25(4) ukuya ku-(9) soMthetho-sisekelo sinokuchazwa njengezindlela zokulungisa lezo ezibeka isibopho kuHulumeni sokuba athathe isinyathelo sokugqugquzela ukulungisa ngezomhlaba nokunye ukuqinisekisa ukuze abantu bakwazi ukufinyelela izinsiza ezingokwemvelo zezwe laseNingizimu Afrika.
zu.interpretation: Isigaba 25 soMthetho-sisekelo, umshwana wempahla-mhlaba, sihlelemba izifiso ezincintisanayo. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, leli lungelo livikela abanini bamalungelo empahla-mhlaba akhona kanti, ngakolunye uhlangothi, lesi sigaba sihlose futhi ukulungisa ukungabikho kobulungisa okungokomlando mayelana namalungelo omhlaba nempahla-mhlaba, lawo ngokujwayelekile ayengekho noma ekhona okungatheni ngaphansi kombuso wobandlululo. Akukho muntu okuvumeleke ukuba ephucwe impahla-mhlaba ngaphandle kokulandela umthetho osetshenziswa jikelele.
zu.legislation: In December 2019, the Ad Hoc Committee on the Amendment of Section 25 of the Constitution published the Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill. The Bill aimed to amend section 25 of the Constitution to provide that where land and any other improvements are expropriated for the purpose of land reform, the amount of compensation may be nil. It is important to note, that as the Bill relates to an amendment of a right in the Bill of Rights, such an amendment can only be passed with a supporting vote of at least two thirds of the members in the National Assembly and a supporting vote of at least six provinces in the National Council of Provinces.

zu.title: Izindlu
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba siqinisekisa ilungelo lokuba nekhaya futhi kungabikho ukukhishwa ngenkani ngaphandle kwesiyalelo senkantolo.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 26(1) soMthetho-sisekelo sihlinzeka ukuthi wonke umuntu unelungelo lokuba nekhaya elanele izidingo kanti isigaba 26(2) sibophezela uHulumeni ukuba ngokwesilinganiso esihle athathe izinyathelo zomthetho nezinye, kuye ngokwezinsiza (resources) anazo, ukuba ngokuqhubekayo kufezekiswe leli lungelo. Isigaba 26(3) soMthetho-sisekelo siqinisekisa ukuthi akukho muntu okuvumeleke ukuba akhishwe ngenkani ekhaya lakhe noma kubhidlizwe ikhaya lakhe ngaphandle kwesiyalelo senkantolo, ngemva kokuba leyo Nkantolo iye yacabangela zonke izimo eziphathelene nendaba.
zu.interpretation:
Isigaba 26(1) soMthetho-sisekelo sibeka isibopho sokwenza (positive obligation) phezu kukaHulumeni sokuba ahlinzeke ngezindlu [zamakhaya]. Lesi sigaba sibhekise ngokukhethekile ekutholakaleni okuye kwahunyushwa ngokuthi kusho ukuthi ilungelo lokuba nekhaya elanele izidingo kusho okungaphezulu kwezitini nodaka kodwa ukuthi kumele kwenziwe zitholakale izinkonzo ezidingekayo, ezinjengomhlaba, amanzi nogesi. Umsebenzi kaHulumeni ekufezeni lesi sibopho uzohluka kuye ngokweqembu labantu ngokwezomnotho. Emkhakheni onethezeke kakhudlwana ngokwezomnotho kungase kusho ukwenziwa kutholakale ugesi namanzi kanti eqenjini elintula kakhudlwana kungasho ukwenziwa kutholakale umhlaba okuzokwakhiwa kuwo izindlu ngaphezu kokwenza ukuba lezi zinkonzo zitholakale.

 

Isigaba 26(2) sibhekisa esibopheni sikaHulumeni sokuqinisekisa ‘ukufezekiswa okuqhubekayo’ kwaleli lungelo. Loku kuyisithiyo esiqaphela ukuthi amalungelo angokwezenhlalo nezomnotho awakwazi ukufezekiswa ngokuphelele khona manjalo. Kodwa sona lesi sigatshana sibeka umthwalo phezu kukaHulumeni. Empeleni uHulumeni kumele athathe ‘izinyathelo zokushaywa komthetho nokunye’ ezihloselwe ukufezekisa la malungelo. Kuzofuneka uHulumeni abonise ukuthi izinyathelo zokushaywa komthetho nokunye eziye zathathwa ukuze kufezeke leli lungelo zisesilinganisweni esikahle: ukuthi uyazisebenzisa izinsiza anazo futhi njengoba sihamba isikhathi uzithatha ngenkuthalo izinyathelo zokufezekisa leli lungelo. Ngakho-ke, akukho ndinganiso ebekiwe, ngokwesibonelo, njengokuthi uHulumeni kumele ahlizeke izindlu ezingaki. Okudingekayo nje wukuthi uHulumeni abonise ukuthi ukwenza konke okusemandleni akhe ngokwezinsiza anazo.
zu.legislation: Section 26(3) of the Constitution provides strong protection against undue State interference and the Prevention of Illegal Eviction from and Unlawful Occupation of Land Act 19 of 1998 specifically gives effect to section 26(3) and provides for the procedure for the eviction of unlawful occupiers.

zu.title: Ukunakekelwa ngezempilo, ukudla, amanzi, nenhlalakahle
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lokukwazi ukufinyelela izinkonzo zonakekelo lwezempilo.
zu.topic_meaning:
Empeleni isigaba 27(1) soMthetho-sisekelo siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lokukwazi ukufinyelela izinkonzo zonakekelo lwezempilo kuhlanganise nonakekelo lwezempilo olumayelana nokuzala, ukudla namanzi okwanele kanye nokulondeka kwezenhlalo, kuhlanganise, uma umuntu engenawo amandla okuzondla yena nalabo abathembele kuye, ukwelekelelwa ngokwezenhlalo okufanelekile.

Ngokwesigaba 27(2) soMthetho-sisekelo, uHulumeni kumele athathe izinyathelo zokushaywa kwemithetho nokunye, ngokusesilinganisweni esikahle, ukuze ngokuqhubekayo awafezekise la malungelo. Okokugcina, isigaba 27(3) soMthetho-sisekelo sihlobene nelungelo lokuthi akukho muntu okuvumeleke ukuba anqatshelwe usizo lwezokwelapha lwesimo esiphuthumayo.
zu.interpretation: Isigaba 27 soMthetho-sisekelo siyingxenye yeqoqo lamalungelo angokwenhlalo nezomnotho aqukethwe wuMthetho-sisekelo. Amalungelo angokwezenhlalo nezomnotho abeka isibopho sokwenza kuHulumeni ukuba athathe isinyathelo sokuqinisekisa ukufezeka kwezidingo zomphakathi eziyisisekelo.
zu.mechanism:
Isigaba 27 soMthetho-sisekelo siyingxenye yeqoqo lamalungelo angokwenhlalo nezomnotho aqukethwe wuMthetho-sisekelo. Amalungelo angokwezenhlalo nezomnotho abeka isibopho sokwenza kuHulumeni ukuba athathe isinyathelo sokuqinisekisa ukufezeka kwezidingo zomphakathi eziyisisekelo.

 

Ukwenziwa kwala malungelo angokwezenhlalo nezomnotho afinyeleleke kulawulwa ngezindlela ezintathu. Eyokuqala imayelana nokuba sesilinganisweni esikahle kwezinyathelo ezithathwa wuHulumeni, eyesibili imayelana nokusetshenziswa kwezinsiza nesabelo-mali esikhona kanti eyokugcina iwukuthi uHulumeni abonise ukuthi uyayenza intuthuko eya ekufezekeni kwala malungelo. Kumele abonise ukuthi zinyathelo zini azithathile njengoba isikhathi sihamba. Kwenziwa umehluko phakathi kwelungelo lokuthola usizo lwezokwelapha lwesimo esiphuthumayo nelungelo lokukwazi ukufinyelela izinkonzo zonakekelo lwezempilo. Ilungelo lokuthola usizo liphathelene ngokuyinhloko nelungelo lokunganqatshelwa i-ambulense esimeni esiphuthumayo noma ukujikiswa esibhedlela uma uzothola unakekelo lwezempilo oluphuthumayo noludingekile.

zu.title: Izingane
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sihlinzeka uhlu lwamalungelo ezinganeni, ukusukela elungelweni lokuba umuntu aziwe ngokusemthethweni ukuthi uwubani ukuya elungelweni lokunakekelwa ngabazali.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 28 soMthetho-sisekelo sihlinzeka uhlu lwamalungelo ezinganeni, ukusuka elungelweni lokuba umuntu aziwe ngokusemthethweni ukuthi uwubani; ukuvikeleka okungokomthetho-sisekelo kwelungelo lengane ukuba ibe negama nobuzwe ukusuka ekuzalweni, ukuya elungelweni lokunakekelwa ngabazali; kanye nelungelo lokuvikeleka emikhubeni yokuxhashazwa kwezisebenzi.
zu.interpretation: Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi amalungelo angokomthetho-sisekelo anikwa izingane ngokwesigaba 28 soMthetho-sisekelo anezela phezu kwanoma yimaphi amanye amalungelo angokomthetho-sisekelo izingane ezinawo oHleni Lwamalungelo (Bill of Rights). Ngokukhethekile, injongo yesigaba 28 soMthetho-sisekelo iwukuvikela izingane ezimeni lapho zinokuphathwa kabi kalula.
zu.mechanism: Indinganiso yemfuneko yokuba kuzuzise kakhulu enganeni iye yashayelelwa kuMthetho-sisekelo futhi isigaba 28(2) soMthetho-sisekelo sigcizelela ukuthi ukuzuzisa kakhulu ingane kubaluleke ukwedlula konke kunanoma yiphi into ethinta ingane. Le ndinganiso ihlinzeka ukuthi, ngokwesibonelo, empikiswaneni ethinta izingane, iNkantolo kumele igxile kuloko okuyozuzisa kakhulu ingane kuleso simo ngaphambi kokugxila emalungelweni abazali kanye naloko abakukhethayo. Indinganiso yokuzuzisa kakhulu ibeka isibopho naphezu koMbuso sokuba uthathe isinyathelo sokuqinisekisa ukuthi zikhona izinhlaka ezingokomthetho nokuqondisa okungokwamabhuku (administration) ukuze kuvikelwe izingane.
zu.legislation: The Children’s Act 38 of 2005 has been enacted specifically to give effect to the rights of children.

zu.title: Imfundo
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sihlinzeka ngokuthi wonke umuntu unelungelo lokuthola imfundo eyisisekelo kanye nemfundo engaphezu kweyisisekelo, leyo uhulumeni, ngokuthatha izinyathelo ezisesilinganisweni esikahle, okumele ayenze itholakale ngokuqhubekayo futhi ifinyeleleke.
zu.topic_meaning:
Isigaba 29 soMthetho-sisekelo sihlinzekela amalungelo emfundo futhi sibalula ukuthi wonke umuntu unelungelo lokuthola imfundo eyisisekelo nemfundo engaphezu kweyisisekelo leyo uhulumeni, ngokuthatha izinyathelo ezisesilinganisweni esikahle, okumele ayenze itholakale ngokuqhubekayo futhi ifinyeleleke.

Isigaba 29 (2) soMthetho-sisekelo sibuye sihlinzeke ukuthi wonke umuntu unelungelo lokuthola imfundo nganoma luphi ulimi olusemthethweni alukhethayo, lapho loku ngokwesilinganiso esikahle kunokwenzeka khona. Leli yiphuzu elifakiwe elibalulekile ngoba ngesikhathi sombuso wobandlululo kwakuqashelwa isiNgisi nesiBhunu kuphela njengezilimi ezisemthethweni nokufundiswa ngazo. Nokho, leli lungelo linezithiyo zangaphakathi futhi liye laba yindaba yeziningi izimpikiswano ezingokomthetho.

Okokugcina, isigaba 29(3) soMthetho-sisekelo sinika ukuvikeleka kwelungelo lokumisa izikole ezizimele uma nje lezo zikole: i) zingabandlululi ngokohlanga; ii) zibhalisa kuHulumeni futhi iii) zilondoloza izindinganiso ezifanelekile. Okubalulekile, uHulumeni akanasibopho sokuhlinzeka ngezinsiza kulezo zikole ngenxa yokuthi zisebenza ngezindleko zazo kanti uHulumeni umane nje unesibopho sokungenzi (negative duty) esiwukuthi angagxambukeli kulezo zikole.
zu.interpretation:
Ngokungafani namalungelo angokwezenhlalo nezomnotho asoHleni Lwamalungelo (Bill of Rights), ilungelo lemfundo eyisisekelo liyilungelo okumele litholakale nakanjani futhi aliyi ngokuntuleka kwezinsiza. Mayelana nelungelo lokuthola imfundo engaphezu kweyisisekelo uHulumeni akabophekile ukuyenza itholakale kumuntu wonke khona manjalo. UHulumeni ubopheke kuphela ukuba athathe izinyathelo ezisesilinganisweni esikahle njengoba isikhathi sihamba ukwenza lezo zikhungo zitholakale.

 

Njengoba ilungelo lokuthola imfundo eyisisekelo lingelomuntu wonke, aligcini kuzakhamuzi kuphela kodwa lisebenza nakulabo abangezona izakhamuzi. Ngaphezu kwaloko, ilungelo lokuthola imfundo eyisisekelo alipheleli ekutholeni indawo ezikoleni kuphela, kodwa futhi lihlanganisa nokufinyelela izinto zokufundisa nokuqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izikhungo zikufanelekele ukufunda.

zu.title: Ulimi namasiko
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sinika ukuvikeleka kwelungelo lokusebenzisa ulimi lwakho nokubamba iqhaza ekuphileni okungokwesikompilo kokuzikhethela.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 30 soMthetho-sisekelo sivikela ilungelo lokusebenzisa komuntu ulimi lwakhe kanye nokubamba iqhaza ekuphileni kwesikompilo kokuzikhethela. Leli ngelinye lamalungiselelo ahlukahlukene akuMthetho-sisekelo anika ukuvikeleka emaqenjini abantu ngokobuzwe bendabuko (ethnic), ngokwenkolo nangokolimi eNingizimu Afrika futhi sibonisa nokuzibophezela emthethwenbi wamazwe sokunika ukuvikeleka kwalawo maqembu.
zu.mechanism: It is, however, subject to the condition that these rights may not be exercised in a way that is inconsistent with other fundamental human rights guaranteed in the Bill of Rights. For instance, the right to exercise a cultural practice must be consistent with an individual’s right to dignity and freedom and security of the person. If the right is practised in a manner that endangers a person’s life then it is inconsistent with the constitutional protection afforded in terms of section 30 of the Constitution and the State can intervene to protect an individual.

zu.title: Imiphakathi yamasiko, izinkolo kanye nezilimi ezithile
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sinika ukuvikeleka kubantu bemiphakathi ehlukene ngokwesikompilo, inkolo noma ulimi.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 31 soMthetho-sisekelo sinika ukuvikeleka kubantu bemiphakathi ehlukene ngokwesikompilo, inkolo noma ulimi. Abantu balawo maqembu akufanele banqatshelwe ilungelo lokujabulela isikompilo labo, baqhube inkolo yano futhi basebenzise ulimi lwabo. UMbuso awuvumelekile ukuphazamisa amalungelo abantu balawo maqembu ukuba bakhe futhi balondoloze izinhlangano zesikompilo, inkolo noma ulimi.
zu.interpretation: Isigaba 31 soMthetho-sisekelo sivikela kokubili izifiso ezingokwesikompilo, inkolo nolimi zomuntu ngamunye kanye nezomphakathi. Ukuze umuntu ngamunye akileyime la malungelo ngokwalesi sigaba, loyo muntu kudingeka aveze ubufakazi bokuthi kukhona ukuxhumana phakathi kwakhe nawo. Kanti futhi isigaba 31 soMthetho-sisekelo sisekelwe ngokukhethekile enhlamvini (article) 27 yeSivumelwano Samazwe Ngamalungelo Kwezomphakathi Nakwezepolitiki (International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights) okwenza ukuvikeleka ngokomthetho-sisekelo okunikwa imiphakathi yamasikompilo, inkolo nolimi kuhambisana nomthetho wamazwe.
zu.mechanism: La malungelo akumele asetshenziswe ngendlela engqubuzana nanoma ziphi ezinye izinto ezihlinzekwe oHleni Lwamalungelo (Bill of Rights). Ngokwesibonelo, uma inkambiso engokwenkolo yomphakathi ilimaza ukuphila komuntu, khona-ke isigaba 31 soMthetho-sisekelo asikwazi ukuba namandla ngaphezu kwelungelo lomuntu ngamunye lenkululeko nokulondeka komuntu uma ngabe leli lungelo libekeka engozini. Abantu akumele basebenzise la malungelo ngendlela ethiya amalungelo abanye ngokungenasisekelo esizwakalayo.

zu.title: Ukuthola ulwazi
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lokuthola noma luphi ulwazi (information) olugcinwe wuHulumeni kanye nanoma luphi ulwazi olugcinwe ngomunye umuntu oludingekela ukusetshenziswa noma ukuvikelwa kwanoma maphi amalungelo.
zu.topic_meaning:
Isigaba 32 soMthetho-sisekelo siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lokuthola noma luphi ulwazi (information) olugcinwe wuHulumeni kanye nanoma luphi ulwazi olugcinwe ngomunye umuntu oludingekela ukusetshenziswa noma ukuvikelwa kwanoma maphi amalungelo.

 

Kubalulekile ukunaka ukuthi ukuqinisekiswa kwaleli lungelo elingokomthetho-mthetho kuwukuzimisela ukugqashuka ebushiqeleni bukahulumeni wobandlululo. Ukufinyeleleka kolwazi (access to information) kubaluleke kakhulu ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi lezo zinto ezingamagugu (values) ngokomthetho-sisekelo okuwukuthi ukulandisa, ukungafihli (transparency) nokwenza ngokukhululekile (openness) ziyafezwa futhi kuyithuluzi elinamandla lokusetshenziswa ekulwisaneni nenkohlakalo. Ngokwengxenye, ilungelo lokuthola ulwazi lisekelwe esimisweni sokuthi umuntu kufanele avunyelwe ukuthola ulwazi olumayelana naye ngokukhethekile, noma ngomqondo osabalele, ulwazi uHulumeni alusebenzisa ekwenzeni lezo zinqumo ezingase zimthinte umuntu noma umphakathi kabanzi.
zu.legislation: The State is furthermore obliged to enact national legislation to give effect to this constitutional right and the Promotion of Access to Information Act 2 of 2000 (PAIA) specifically gives effect to this right. A person who wishes to access information held by the State or a private institution will be required to follow the procedures set out in PAIA.

zu.title: Ukuphatha ngokusemthethweni okulungileyo
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lokuphathwa yiminyango nezakhiwo zombuso ngendlela efanelekile, enokucabangela okuhle nelandela inqubo enobulungisa.
zu.topic_meaning:
Isigaba 33 soMthetho-sisekelo siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lokuphathwa yiminyango nezakhiwo zombuso ngendlela efanelekile, enokucabangela okuhle nelandela inqubo enobulungisa futhi sinika abantu ngabanye ilungelo lokucela izizathu lapho amalungelo abo eye anyathelwa khona yiminyango noma izakhiwo zombuso. Leli lungelo liqinisekisa ukuthi kulandelwa izinqubo ezifanele lapho kwenziwa izinqumo eminyangweni noma izakhiwo zombuso, nanokuthi lezo zinqumo zifanelekile futhi zinokucabangela okuhle. Indlela eyinhloko leli lungelo elifezekiswa ngayo iwukuba kube khona ukubhekwa busha kokwahlulela kwaloko okwenziwe wumnyango wombuso noma isakhiwo.

Ukwenziwa umthetho ohleliwe kwaleli lungelo elingokomthetho-sisekelo lokuba umuntu athole ubulungisa eminyangweni noma izakhiwo zombuso kubonakalisa ukuzimisela ngokubekela amandla amakhulu ezikhulu eziphethe imingcele. Umbuso wobandlululo wawaziwa ngokuthi uhulumeni wayesebenzisa amandla angenamkhawulo. Ngokuphambene, ngaphansi kohlelo olusha lomthetho-sisekelo lweNingizimu Afrika, lawo mandla kumele ahambisane noMthetho-sisekelo futhi kumele asetshenziswe ngokufanele, abe nokucabangela okuhle futhi alandele inqubo enobulungisa.
zu.interpretation: Okwenziwa yiminyango noma izakhiwo zombuso kusho ukusetshenziswa kwamandla okulawula umphakathi ezinhlaka zoMbuso kanye nezinye izikhulu zikahulumeni. Kubhekiswe endleleni labo abasebenza kule minyango nezakhiwo abaziphatha ngayo ekwenzeni umsebenzi wabo wansuku zonke njengoba inemiphumela ewumthelela kubantu ngabanye noma amaqembu. Loku kwehlukile kuloko okwenziwa yizikhulu, okuwukuthi, izenzo zalabo abasemagunyeni lapho besebenzisa amandla abo, ngokuvamile okubandakanya ukusebenzisa imithetho eshayiwe kanye nokwakhiwa kwenqubomgomo. Lezo zenzo azibhekwa busha njengokwenziwa yiminyango yombuso kanye nezakhiwo, kodwa nazo zinako ukubhekisiswa ngendlela yokwahlulela kodwa ngaphansi kwezisekelo ezixegisiwe kancane.
zu.legislation: The State is obliged to enact national legislation to give effect to section 33 of the Constitution and the Promotion of Administrative Justice Act 3 of 2000 was enacted to give effect to these rights. Certain acts do not fall under “administrative action” and are not reviewable in terms of the Promotion of Administrative Justice Act. This includes judicial acts (such as presiding over cases) by the judiciary; acts by the President when exercising his inherent powers conferred by the Constitution, such as appointing commissions of inquiry or granting presidential pardons; acts by the legislature when exercising their primary functions; and purely political decisions by cabinet.

zu.title: Ukufinyelela ezinkantolo
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lokubai impikiswano anayo yomthetho inqunywe ngokuqulwa obala ngokunobulungisa ngaphambi kwenkantolo noma isithangami esifanelekile.
zu.topic_meaning:
Isigaba 34 soMthetho-sisekelo siqinisekisa wonke umuntu ngelungelo lokuba noma yiphi impikiswano anayo enokuxazululwa ngokusebenzisa umthetho inqunywe ngokuqulwa obala ngokunobulungisa ngaphambi kwenkantolo noma, lapho kufaneleka khona, inkundla efanelekile noma isithangami.

Leli lungelo liyingxenye ebaluleke kakhulu yomthetho. Leli lungelo libalulekile uma kuqhathaniswa nokulahlelwa ngaphandle kwegunya lezinkantolo okuyinto eyayivumelekile ngenkathi yombuso wobandlululo. Lesi sigaba sakha ilungelo lenqubo efanele yokulandelwa ebizela ukuba kube khona ukuqulwa kodaba esidlangalaleni nokunobulungisa. Nokho, nanoma luphi udaba olulethwa ngaphambi kwenkantolo kumele lukwazi ukuxazululwa ngokusebenzisa umthetho.
zu.interpretation:
Leli lungelo elingokomthetho-sisekelo alinakuhunyushwa ngokuthi umuntu angaya kunoma yiphi inkantolo noma inkundla ezimele ukuze kuxazululwe impikiswano ethile, ngenxa yokuthi isasebenza imithetho yegunya (jurisdiction) (okuwukuthi, imithetho elawula ukuthi yiyiphi inkantolo enokuqula luphi udaba). Nokho, umuntu unalo ilungelo lokuya enkantolo efanelekayo noma inkundla lapho kufaneleka khona, ukuze kuxazululwe impikiswano futhi akanakuphoqwa ukuba alilahle leli lungelo.

 

UHulumeni unesibopho sokwenza kube lula ukutholakala kobulungisa ngokuthi athathe izinyathelo zokushaya umthetho noma okunye.

zu.title: Abantu ababoshiwe, abavalelwe nababekwe amacala
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sihlinzeka amalungelo kubantu ababoshiwe, abavalelwe kanye nabamangalelwe.
zu.topic_meaning:
Inkambiso yezobulungisa mayelana nokwephulwa komthetho iye yashintshwa kakhulu ngaphansi kohlelo olusha lomthetho-sisekelo eNingizimu Afrika futhi ineziqinile izikhonkwane nemigoqo okubekelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amandla kahulumeni awasetshenziswa kabi. Ngokukhethekile, isigaba 35 soMthetho-sisekelo sihlinzeka amalungelo kubantu ababoshiwe, abavalelwe kanye nabamangalelwe futhi uhlu lwamalungelo angokomthetho-sisekelo akulesi sigaba asebenza kuphela uma umuntu ewela kwesinye salezi zigaba.

 

Ngokwesibonelo, isigaba 35(1) (a) soMthetho-sisekelo sihlinzeka ngokukhethekile ukuthi umuntu oboshwe ngoba kuthiwa unecala lokwephula umthetho unelungelo lokungasho lutho kuhlanganise namanye amalungelo ahlukahlukene anjengokuthi akanakuphoqelelwa ukuvuma noma yini enokusetshenziswa njengobufakazi obumlahlayo. Abantu abavalelwe ngokwesigaba 35(2) soMthetho-sisekelo, kuhlanganise wonke umuntu ogwetshiwe, banelungelo lokuba batshelwe ngokushesha ukuthi bavalelwa ngasizathu sini futhi umuntu omangalelwe ngokwesigaba 35(3) soMthetho-sisekelo unelungelo lokuba icala lakhe liqulwe ngokunobulungisa okuhlanganisa namanye amalungelo ahlukahlukene njengelungelo lokwaziswa ukuthi yini amangalelwe ngayo futhi kube nemininingwane eyanele ukuze akwazi ukuphendula kanye namalungelo okuthathwa komuntu njengongenalo icala nokungaphoqelelwa ukuba anike ubufakazi bokuzilahla ngokwakhe.

 

Isigaba 35(5) soMthetho-sisekelo sihlinzeka ikhambi ngokwephulwa kwamalungelo angokomthetho-sisekelo futhi sibalula ukuthi ubufakazi obutholwe ngendlela eyephula noma liphi ilungelo elisoHleni Lwamalungelo (Bill of Rights) kumele libekwe eceleni uma ukwemukelwa kwalobo bufakazi buzokwenza ukuqulwa kwecala kube ngokungenabulungisa noma ngandlela thile buphazamise ukufezwa kobulungisa.

zu.title: Ukuncishiswa kwamalungelo
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sihlinzeka izimo lapho amalungelo aqakonyiswe oHleni Lwamalungelo (Bill of Rights) engase abekelwe khona imingcele.
zu.topic_meaning: Isigaba 36 soMthetho-sisekelo sihlinzeka izinto okukalwa ngazo ezimeni lapho amalungelo asoHleni Lwamalungelo (Bill of Rights) engase abekelwe khona imingcele. Amalungelo aqukethwe oHleni Lwamalungelo awayona into ewujuqu nakanjani okusho ukuthi anako ukubekelwa imingcele. Leyo mingcele kumele ivumelane nezinto okukalwa ngazo ezibekwe esigabeni 36 soMthetho-sisekelo ukuze ibhekwe njengefanelekile.
zu.interpretation:
Isigaba 36 soMthetho-sisekelo sisebenza kuwo onke amalungelo asoHleni Lwamalungelo futhi sisebenza ngokulandela amagxathu amabili. Ilungelo elisoHleni Lwamalungelo linokubekelwa imingcele kuphela ngokomthetho othile osebenza kubantu bonke. Umthetho osebenza kubantu bonke wumthetho osebenza ngokulinganayo kubo bonke abantu ezweni futhi ongahloselwe abantu abathile kuphela. Umbuzo wokubuzwa uwukuthi ingabe ukubekelwa imingcele noma ukwenqatshelwa lelo lungelo kuqukethwe emthethweni othile osebenza kubantu bonke (isib. imithetho eshayiwe noma iziqondiso). Kuleli gxathu lokuqala akubhekwa ukuthi lowo mngcele uyafaneleka noma cha, kodwa kumane nje kuwumbuzo wokuthi ukhona yini kwakuba khona umngcele.

 

Uma ikhona imingcele, khona-ke kuzobhekwa ukuthi lowo mngcele unako yini ukucabangela okuhle futhi uyafaneleka yini emphakathini ovulekile nolawulwa ngentando yeningi ngokusekelwe kusithunzi (dignity) sobuntu, ukulingana nenkululeko, kucatshangelwa zonke izici eziphathelene nendaba okuhlanganisa ubunjalo belungelo, ukubaluleka kwenjongo yalowo mngcele; ubunjalo nobungako bomngcele; ukuhlobana phakathi komngcele nenjongo yawo nendlela yokuxegisa ukuze kufezwe leyo njongo.

 

Kungasemva kokuba sekuqhathaniswe kahle zonke lezi zici kanye nanoma ziphi ezinye izici eziphathelene nendaba lapho iNkantolo iyothola khona ukuthi lowo mngcele uyafaneleka yini ngokomthetho-sisekelo noma cha. Loku kubandakanya ukwahlulela ukuthi into ibaluleke kangakanani kanye nokuhlaziya ukuthi into kudingeka ibe ngakanani, okuyinto edinga ukubhalansa izithakazelo (interests) ezithintekayo. Okokugcina, isibopho sokuveza ubufakazi siphezu kwalolo hlangothi olufuna ukuba kusetshenziswe lowo mngcele. Ngakho-ke, kuyofuneka ukuba isishayamthetho sibonise ukuthi kungani umthetho olawula okuqukethwe kumafilimu ufanelekile ekuthiyeni ilungelo lenkululeko yokuveza okusenhliziyweni (freedom of expression).
zu.mechanism: Ngokwesibonelo, umthetho olawula loko okuqukethwe kumafilimu ubeke nemingcele kulawo mafilimu, ulibekela imingcele ilungelo lenkululeko yokuveza okusenhliziyweni. Nokho, uma injongo yalo mngcele iwukuvikela izingane ekubukeni izinto ezilimazayo, kuzophakama umbuzo wokuthi ingabe lo mthetho othiya ilungelo lenkululeko yokuveza okusenhliziyweni uyiwo yini umngcele ofanelekile ngokwesigaba 36 soMthetho-sisekelo. Uma lowo mthetho uvumelana kahle nezinto okukalwa ngazo zesigaba 36 soMthetho-sisekelo khona-ke lowo mngcele uyafaneleka ngokomthetho-sisekelo.

zu.title: Izimo ezibucayi
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sihlinzeka ukuthi kunini nangaphansi kwaziphi izimo lapho kumenyezelwa khona isimo esibucayi.
zu.topic_meaning:
Isigaba 37 soMthetho-sisekelo sihlinzeka ukuthi kunini nangaphansi kwaziphi izimo lapho kungase kumenyezelwe khona isimo esibucayi. Isimo esibucayi singamenyezelwa kuphela ngokuhlangabezana nemibandela ethile enqala ngokwalesi sigaba. Ukulengiswa okwesikhashana kwamalungelo abantu ayisisekelo kuyafaneleka uma kuwukuthi ukuphila kwesizwe kusongelwa yimpi, ukuhlaselwa, ukuvukelwa kombuso okusabalele, iziyaluyalu noma okunye okuphuthumayo emphakathini futhi leso simemezelo sidingekela ukubuyisela ukuthula nokuhleleka.

 

Ukumenyezelwa kwesimo esibucayi kungenziwa kuphela ngokoMthetho kaHulumeni futhi akufanele kuqhubeke ngaphezu kwezinsuku ezi-21 ngaphandle kokuba uMkhandlu Kazwelonke (National Assembly) unquma ukuselula futhi, nalapho, loko kwelulwa kumele kuhlangabezane nemibandela ethile.

 

Futhi lesi sigaba sihlinzeka iThebula Lamalungelo Angenakushalazelelwa futhi nanoma muphi umthetho oshayelwe ukufezekisa isimo esibucayi awunakuwashalazelela la malungelo ngokwezinga elihlinzekwe kuleli thebula, amanye amalungelo awanakushalazelelwa nhlobo. Ngokwesibonelo, ilungelo lokuphila alinakushalazelelwa ngisho nakancane.
zu.legislation: It is also important to note that there is a difference between the declaration of a State of Emergency and the declaration of a State of National Disaster. The onslaught of the Covid-19 pandemic in 2020 caused the declaration of a National State of Disaster in terms of the Disaster Management Act 57 of 2002 whereas a State of Emergency may only be declared under the State of Emergency Act 64 of 1997, and section 37 of the Constitution, and only in very limited circumstances.

zu.title: Ukuphoqelelwa kwamalungelo
zu.snippet: Relates to the enforcement of rights in the Bill of Rights in a court and sets out who can approach a court to allege that a right has been infringed.
zu.topic_meaning:
Section 38 of the Constitution relates to the enforcement of rights in the Bill of Rights in a competent court and sets out who can approach a court to allege that their, or another person’s, rights have been infringed or threatened. This section adopts a wide approach to standing and “threatened” indicates that a person may also approach a court if they believe there might be a future violation of a right in the Bill of Rights.

Persons who may approach a Court include: “anyone acting in their own interest; anyone acting on behalf of another person who cannot act in their own name; anyone acting as a member of, or in the interest of, a group or class of persons; anyone acting in the public interest and an association acting in the interest of its members”. The Court in such an instance may “grant appropriate relief, including a declaration of rights”.
zu.mechanism: In order to rely on section 38 of the Constitution, one does not need to prove that a right of a specific person or persons have been infringed or threatened – one only needs to allege that a right in the Bill of Rights has been infringed or threatened and provide support for this allegation.

zu.title: Ukuhunyushwa koMqulu wamaLungelo
zu.snippet: Lesi sigaba sinika isiqondiso sokuthi uHla Lwamalungelo (Bill of Rights) kufanele luqondakale kanjani.
zu.topic_meaning:
Isigaba 39(1) soMthetho-sisekelo sibeka isibopho phezu kwenkantolo, inkundla noma isithangami sokuthi lapho kuhlonzwa incazelo yoHla Lwamalungelo kubekwe phambili loko okubalulekile okusekela umphakathi ovulekile wentando yabantu ngokusekelwe esithunzini sobuntu, ukulingana, nenkululeko futhi sibeka isibopho kuleyo nkantolo, inkundla noma isithangami sokuba kucatshangelwe nomthetho wamazwe futhi sisho nokuthi sinako ukukhetha ukucabangela umthetho wakwamanye amazwe.

 

Isigaba 39(2) soMthetho-sisekelo sibeka isibopho phezu kwanoma yiphi inkantolo, inkundla noma isithangami lapho kuhlonzwa incazelo yanoma muphi umthetho oshayiwe, nalapho kuthuthukiswa umthetho-mvama (common law) noma umthetho ongokwesiko (customary law) sokuba kugqugquzelwe umoya nezinhloso zoHla Lwamalungelo. Isigaba 39(2) silawula ngokugudlisela ukusetshenziswa koHla Lwamalungelo futhi sivumela ukuba uthuthukiswe umthetho-mvama ngokuvumelana noHla Lwamalungelo. Lapho zisebenzisa isigaba 39(2) izinkantolo zencika kulawo magugu (values) ayisisekelo soHla Lwamalungelo bese zihlola ukuthi kuyadingeka yini ukuwuthuthukisa umthetho ukuze uvumelane kahle nala magugu angokomthetho-sisekelo.

 

Isigaba 39(3) soMthetho-sisekelo sihlinzeka ukuthi uHla Lwamalungelo alukuphiki ukuthi akhona amalungelo noma izinkululeko kumthetho-mvama, umthetho ongokwesiko noma umthetho oshayiwe kodwa nokho kuphela ngezinga ovumelana ngalo noHla Lwamalungelo.
zu.interpretation: Ukusetshenziswa komthetho wamazwe kubhekise kuko kokubili umthetho wamazwe oyisibopho nalowo ongesona isibopho mayelana nesiqondiso sendlela yokuqondakala. Ngokwesibonelo, iNingizimu Afrika yasayina futhi yemukela (okusho ukuthi ivuma ukuthi siyasebenza emthethweni waseNingizimu Afrika) iSivumelwano Samazwe Ngamalungelo Omphakathi Nawepollitki (International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights, [ICCPR]), esinika isiqondiso sendlela yokuqondakala kwamalungelo ahlukahlukene omphakathi nawezepolitiki. Uma umuntu ethi umthetho othile unyathela ilungelo lakhe elingokomthetho-sisekelo lokuba nengasese iNkantolo ibophekile ukunaka isiqondiso se-ICCPR kuleyo ndaba. Ngokuqondene nokusetshenziswa komthetho wakwamanye amazwe ngenjongo yesiqondiso endleleni yokuqondakala, inkantolo, inkundla noma isithangami kwenza ngokuzibonela ekuthini kubheke yini kulowo mthetho futhi kufanele kuqashelwe futhi kunakwe ngaso sonke isikhathi lapho kwenziwa noma kuphi ukuqhathanisa ukuthi izinhlelo zobulungisa (judicial systems) zingase zingafani.

zu.title: Co-operative Government and Intergovernmental Relations
zu.snippet: Governs the constitutional relationship between the three spheres of government.
zu.topic_meaning: Chapter 3 of the Constitution governs the constitutional relationship between the three spheres of government and stipulates the principles of co-operative governance between national, provincial and local government. Importantly section 40(1) of the Constitution confirms that each of these three spheres of government is “distinctive, interdependent and interrelated”. This confirmation recognises the independence of each sphere to govern within its sphere but at the same time recognises the need for interdependency.
zu.mechanism: Section 41 of the Constitution obliges all three spheres of government and organs of state within each sphere to adhere to stipulated constitutional principles such as the need to “preserve the peace, national unity and the indivisibility of the Republic” and the need to “co-operate with one another in mutual trust and good faith by assisting and supporting one another”.
zu.legislation: Section 42 of the Constitution requires the enactment of legislation giving effect to these intergovernmental relations and procedures for the settlement of intergovernmental disputes. The Intergovernmental Relations Framework Act 13 of 2005 specifically provides the framework governing the relationship between these three spheres of government.

zu.title: President and National Executive
zu.snippet: Provides for the power and functions of the President and the National Executive as well as the election and removal of the President by way of impeachment or a motion of no confidence.
zu.topic_meaning:
Chapter 5 of the Constitution provides for the powers and functions of the President and the National Executive as well as the election and removal of the President by way of impeachment or a motion of no confidence. The requirements for a motion of no confidence in the Cabinet, excluding the President is also covered in section 102.

Importantly, sections 84 and 85 of the Constitution provides for the exclusive powers of the President as head of State and head of the national executive respectively. The powers of the President as head of State include the power to assent to and sign Bills and to pardon or reprieve any offenders. These are original presidential powers which may only be exercised by the President.
zu.interpretation: Section 85 of the Constitution confirms that the executive authority of the Republic is vested in the President who, together with members of the cabinet, must implement national legislation, co-ordinate functions of state departments and develop and implement national policy. This section refers to the President’s powers as head of the national executive.
zu.legislation: The exercise of executive power of the National Executive does not constitute “administrative action” in terms of the Promotion of Administrative Justice Act 3 of 2000 and therefore cannot be reviewed in terms of this Act. This, however, does not mean the exercise of these powers cannot be reviewed by the Courts. The Courts will review the exercise of this power under the principle of legality enshrined in section 1(c) of the Constitution.

zu.title: Provincial Executive Authority
zu.snippet: Provides for the powers and functions of the Premier and what can be done when a municipality does not adhere to its executive duties.
zu.topic_meaning:
Sections 125 to 141 of the Constitution, under Chapter 6 of the Constitution, deals with provincial executives.

Section 125 of the Constitution confirms that the executive authority of the province is vested in the Premier and the Premier together with other members of the executive Council exercises the executive authority which includes “implementing provincial legislation”; “developing and implementing provincial policy” and “co-ordinating the functions of the provincial administration and its departments”.
zu.interpretation:
The powers and functions of the Premier is specifically provided for in section 127 of the Constitution which includes the assenting and signing of Bills and the appointment of commissions of inquiry within the province. Importantly, the provincial executive must act in accordance with the Constitution and the provincial constitution, if one has been passed. The province of the Western Cape passed a provincial constitution.

An important and unique mechanism for provincial interference in local government is provided for in section 139 of the Constitution. This section provides for interference by the provincial executive if a municipality is not adhering to its executive duties in terms of the Constitution. The provincial executive has the authority to take “any appropriate steps”. If the provincial executive authority does not or cannot fulfil this duty in terms of section 139, then the national executive authority must intervene.

zu.title: Local Government
zu.snippet: Deals with local government, consisting of municipalities which are vested with both legislative and executive authority.
zu.topic_meaning: Chapter 7 of the Constitution deals with local government, consisting of municipalities which are vested with both legislative and executive authority. These are original powers which are derived directly from the Constitution. Section 151(3) of the Constitution emphasises that a municipality “has the right to govern, on its own initiative, the local government affairs of its community, subject to national and provincial legislation” and importantly national and provincial government may not “compromise or impede a municipality’s ability or right to exercise its power or perform its functions”.
zu.interpretation: Municipalities have the power to pass laws in respect of the functional areas listed in Part B of Schedule 4 and Part B of Schedule 5. The Constitution also gives municipalities the right to exercise any power concerning a matter reasonably necessary for or incidental to the performance of its functions (found in Part B of Schedule 4 and Part B of Schedule 5).
zu.mechanism: Different categories of municipalities are provided for in section 155 of the Constitution.
zu.legislation: The Local Government: Municipal Structures Act 117 of 1998 further defines the different municipalities relating to categories and types of municipality. The Local Government: Municipal Systems Act 32 of 2000 provides for the manner in which municipal powers and functions are exercised.

zu.title: Chapter 9 Institutions
zu.snippet: Provides for the establishment of independent State institutions strengthening constitutional democracy.
zu.topic_meaning: Chapter 9 of the Constitution provides for the establishment of independent State institutions strengthening constitutional democracy. These include the Public Protector; the South African Human Rights Commission; the Commission for the Promotion and Protection of the Rights of Cultural Religious and Linguistic Communities; the Commission for Gender Equality; the Auditor-General and the Electoral Commission and the Independent Broadcasting Authority. These institutions are often colloquially referred to as the “Chapter 9 institutions”.
zu.interpretation:
These institutions in terms of section 181 of the Constitution are independent and are “subject only to the Constitution and the law”. It is critical to emphasise this provision. The Constitutional Court has emphasised that the Public Protector in fulfilling her mandate is “not supposed to bow down to anybody, not even at the door of the highest chambers of raw State power”.

These institutions are obligated in terms of section 181(2) of the Constitution to be impartial and to “exercise their functions without fear, favour or prejudice” and no “person or organ of state may interfere with the functioning of these institutions.” It is also important to note that these institutions only account to the National Assembly on their activities and performance. The remaining provisions of Chapter 9 of the Constitution provides for the functions of each of these institutions, their tenure and removal from office.
zu.mechanism: The Public Protector and Auditor-General in specific are watchdogs over the State and are critical in the fight against corruption and enforcing accountability. The South African Human Rights Commission is mandated to monitor the observance of human rights and take action where human rights have been violated. The Commission for the Promotion and Protection of the Rights of Cultural, Religious and Linguistic Communities has various powers including investigating matters concerning the rights of cultural, religious communities and the Commission for Gender Equality also has extensive power including the power to lobby and investigate issues relating to gender equality. The Electoral Commission is mandated to manage the elections of the national, provincial and municipal legislative bodies.

zu.title: Public Procurement
zu.snippet: Stipulates the constitutional standards of public procurement in South Africa.
zu.topic_meaning:
Section 217 of the Constitution stipulates the constitutional standards of public procurement in South Africa.

Section 217(1) of the Constitution provides that:

“When an organ of state in the national, provincial or local sphere of government, or any other institution identified in national legislation, contracts for goods and services, it must do so in accordance with a system which is fair, equitable, transparent, competitive and cost-effective.”

These five constitutional principles inform the law of public procurement in South Africa.

The Constitution also enables public procurement to be used as a tool to advance persons or categories of persons disadvantaged by unfair discrimination. Importantly, section 217(2) of the Constitution stipulates that the five constitutional principles identified in section 217(1) does not prohibit organs of State from implementing a procurement policy providing preferential allocation of contracts and advancing persons disadvantaged by unfair discrimination.
zu.mechanism:
Section 217(3) of the Constitution requires national legislation to be enacted to provide a framework for such policy and the Preferential Procurement Policy Framework Act 5 of 2000 was specifically enacted in this regard.

Various laws give effect to these constitutional standards in section 217(1) of the Constitution such as the Public Finance Management Act 1 of 1999, which requires the National Treasury to determine a “framework for an appropriate procurement and provisioning system which is fair, equitable, transparent, competitive and cost-effective”.

zu.title: Legislative Process/Competence
zu.snippet: The Constitution divides legislative power between various spheres of government, namely national (Parliament), provincial and local government.
zu.topic_meaning: The Constitution divides legislative power between various spheres of government, namely national (Parliament), provincial and local government. The legislative authority of the national sphere of government is set out in section 44 of the Constitution; section 104 of the Constitution for the provincial sphere; and the powers and functions of municipalities can be found in section 156 of the Constitution. The three spheres of government do not compete with each other but should be viewed as working together and sharing responsibilities.
zu.mechanism:
Importantly Schedule 4 of the Constitution stipulates functional areas of concurrent national and provincial legislative competence and this includes housing, health services and education (excluding tertiary education). This means that both the national and provincial governments can legislate on these areas. Part B of Schedule 4, stipulates functional areas in terms of which local government has concurrent legislative authority in order to manage their own affairs, such as municipal health services.

Schedule 5 of the Constitution stipulates functional areas in terms of which the provincial legislative authority has exclusive provincial competence, such as liquor licences and ambulance services. This means that the provincial government has exclusive legislative authority over these areas and the national government may only intervene and pass legislation on these functional areas in very limited circumstances. Part B of Schedule 5 also stipulates functional areas in terms of which local government has exclusive legislative competence in order to manage their affairs such as beaches and amusement facilities and the control of public nuisances.

zu.title: Separation of Powers
zu.snippet: This principle sees State power divided between the legislative branch, the executive branch and the judiciary.
zu.topic_meaning: South Africa’s new constitutional order provides for a clear distinction between the three branches of the government in order to limit an over-concentration of State power in any one branch and to recognise the functional independence of the three branches of government. This doctrine of separation of powers sees State power divided between the legislative branch (which drafts the law), the executive branch (which implements the law) and the judiciary (which interprets and resolves dispute of the law). This doctrine allows for checks and balances to be carried out by each branch over the others, and ensures that no branch of government can usurp the power of another. Although not specifically mentioned in the Constitution, the doctrine of separation of powers is an essential component of the foundation of South African constitutional law.
zu.interpretation: It should be noted that separation of powers is not an absolute principle. Thus, there is not a complete divide between the three branches of government and there is often an overlap. For example, in cases where Parliament has enacted legislation which the courts declare not to be in line with the Constitution, Parliament will be ordered to redraft the relevant parts of the legislation.
